7F574C0F964A4F74AF4466DBCA747DD7.description:
Analyze cross-cultural similarities and differences in the products to
understand perspectives of the target culture(s) in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

89B2C31AEEAF43BA9E33840D3D3DFA17.description:
Analyze cross-cultural similarities and differences in the practices to
understand perspectives of the target culture(s) in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

D099AD6A202C445AAD828C4E4E988C59.description: Reflect on the significance of the similarities and differences between the target culture(s) and the student’s own culture.

0F7C4AA62AD447AAB0DCF2FD1B732866.description:
Use knowledge of sound and writing systems in the target language to
better understand the student’s own language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

D453709E5767430B99366D19312C5BA1.description:
Recognize how different time frames are expressed in the target language
in the three modes at the advanced-low range.

5D66DBB324544F4DA1CFC9568B16B96C.description:
Compare differences in formal and informal requirements for language
between the target language and their language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

3235D64E7CD34323B850D7AB7EA96AA6.description:
Use appropriate idiomatic expressions in a variety of settings in the three
modes at the advanced-low range.

1A6A358DB3834206BB7BD1A863D9C170.description:
Analyze similarities and differences in the target language and the student’s
own language in the three modes at the advanced-low range.

85FC553F7D7143998FC9CACA46699C48.description: Reflect on the significance of the similarities and differences between the target language and the student’s own language.

A643A6AFC0574BA88E4B723AA14AD287.description:
Comparisons: Develop insight into the nature of
language and culture in order to interact with cultural competence.

528908308B3642C4B626738007DA82CC.description:
Use authentic sources to analyze the distinctive perspectives of the target
language and its cultures when using the three modes at the advanced-low
range.

BA8DD58AD7294D0590B73CDF2D94B217.description:
Research authentic target language resources, analyze the content, and
acquire unique information available only through the target language and
its cultures when using the three modes at the advanced-low range.

E76DF31295E549CDA3DF28DE0AA23CAB.description: Evaluate information and viewpoints present in authentic resources.

E0B520FCF0494C05B06906C1421E4C02.description:
Research target language resources in order to analyze and synthesize
information acquired from authentic target language sources for use in
other content areas when using the three modes at the advanced-low
range.

A9622B5C6D654FAA91C7ED9C9D09212D.description:
Interpret information and apply skills from other content areas to
experiences related to the target language and its cultures when using the
three modes at the advanced-low range.

871FFF6C58454B508C31071526675ADF.description: Evaluate information gathered from target language resources connected to other content areas.

416E50229F9842E5BE81C91F9F76F24C.description:
Connections: Connect with other disciplines and acquire information and
diverse perspectives in order to use the language to function in academic and career-related situations.

D78EC919A1A7403EBC14DF2F5AB2275F.description:
Interact at a competent level in familiar and some unfamiliar cultural
contexts when using the target language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

1FCDB71986E84C03B6FB94EB3CC9C7FB.description:
Demonstrate awareness of subtle differences among cultural behaviors and
adjust the student’s behavior accordingly, in familiar and some unfamiliar
situations when using the target language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

A0FF6681B6234611BAB434D930D60574.description:
Converse comfortably with others from the target culture, in familiar and
some unfamiliar situations and show some understanding of cultural
differences when using the target language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

7FA670F01C7242808A62C3CC945F4857.description:
Explain how a variety of products of public and personal interest are related
to perspectives when using the target language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

B0BAB266DE9B49048DEBB5483F2E4921.description: Explain some diversity among products and how it relates to perspectives in the target cultures and the student’s own.

2742EDBBB5A743D3AB2E75D6A770A17D.description:
Interact at a competent level in familiar and some unfamiliar cultural
contexts when using the target language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

04EA7D8735AE4420995936CC9C744912.description:
Demonstrate awareness of subtle differences among cultural behaviors and
adjust the student’s behavior accordingly in familiar and some unfamiliar
situations when using the target language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

1779A1682D63464DA2947342EDFF693A.description:
Converse comfortably with others from the target culture in familiar and
some unfamiliar situations and show some understanding of cultural
differences when using the target language in the three modes at the
advanced-low range.

5FEB13A1CEA14DA8BAA5C4BE9087B5F3.description:
Explain how a variety of practices within familiar and social situations are
related to perspectives when using the target language in the three modes
at the advanced-low range.

C6744AD1351E40D0B696CFE3A6FF4EB2.description: Explain some diversity among practices and how it relates to perspectives in the target cultures and the student’s own.

50628A1C6C934A4BB565EA70C3C82192.description:
Cultures/Intercultural Communication:
Interact with cultural competence and understanding.

7794EB4514974EA89D3D0D1D648FAD59.description:
Deliver presentations on some concrete academic, social and professional
topics of interest, using paragraphs across major time frames.

156646AD65F04B85BF567D5673CB22AF.description:
State a viewpoint with supporting evidence on some concrete academic,
social and professional topics of interest, using paragraphs across major
time frames.

E5F7D97A2744465BA6BF06A6EE4290C0.description:
Tell stories about school and community events and personal experiences,
using paragraphs across major time frames.

62BB34B43EC64DB9A3C48CC7605EE065.description:
Deliver detailed and organized presentations on familiar as well as unfamiliar concrete topics, in paragraphs and using various time
frames through spoken, written or signed language (presentational mode).

DA27C439926B449597E85C1443905F65.description:
Identify the underlying message and some supporting details in
conversations and discussions across time frames.

8CBCB8A9496645E0AD6D39943BD982CF.description:
Identify the underlying message and some supporting details in fictional
texts across time frames.

3715354276CD4ED7B0D9D42D0BBEB59F.description:
Identify the underlying message and some supporting details in descriptive
informational texts across time frames.

E43C46DA18074EC983E8D012775B47BF.description:
Understand the main message and supporting details on a wide variety of familiar and general interest topics across various time frames
from complex, organized texts that are spoken, written or signed (interpretive mode).

7DA112B742AD40D6805053DB8A12EC4D.description:
Maintain conversations by providing explanations and comparisons of
preferences, opinions, and advice on familiar and concrete academic and
social topics using a few simple paragraphs across major time frames.

F6830740BB4B44BEB05A3F827D7EFA77.description:
Interact and negotiate to resolve an unexpected complication that arises in
a familiar situation, using a few simple paragraphs across major time
frames.

DDE5CBB31E2248C4B92682E0ADFB9F21.description:
Exchange information and ideas on a variety of familiar and concrete
academic and social topics, using a few simple paragraphs across major
time frames.

E97A134F3C844C0E97E1629EB59D8EFD.description:
Maintain spontaneous spoken, written or signed conversations and discussions across various time frames on familiar, as well as
unfamiliar, concrete topics, using series of connected sentences and probing questions (interpersonal mode).

B4126C9FDF3048D7AEA7F8C2415C37CB.description:
Communication: Communicate effectively in more than one
language in order to function in a variety of situations and for multiple purposes.
